title: Why are the lights used at night for the 74/76 project positioned to be so blinding to traffic? The individual fixtures on the portable lighting units are pointed in completely random directions. Some are even pointed up towards the sky, but many are pointed at the traffic on the roads, rather than down towards the work area. It seems that with a little care, they could improve their work environment, and at the same time eliminate the hazard they are creating for drivers.
text: Are you talking about the work on the causeway between Wilmington and Leland?
